external_games.name: Labyrinths of the World: Secrets of Easter Island

name: Labyrinths of the World: Secrets of Easter Island
storyline: MI6 has rewarded you with a vacation to thank you for saving the world. What starts as a relaxing getaway quickly takes a disastrous turn as your world is attacked by an ancient god and their stone statues! Can you stop the destruction before it's too late?
summary: What starts as a relaxing getaway quickly takes a disastrous turn as your world is attacked by an ancient god and their stone statues! Can you stop the destruction before it's too late?
